title: Grab up to 40% off on this Exotic House Plant set!
content:
Filling your home with greenery is an easy way to feel connected to the natural world even when you’re inside, and as the Exotic House Plant set from Oxy-Plants features one Dragon Tree, one Chinese Evergreen and one Umbrella Plant, it’s the perfect way to get started. As if you need any more convincing, with this exclusive deal, you can get up to 40% off this brilliant plant set! To receive a 40% discount on a bundle that includes stylish pots, enter the code 7N9TAH5X at the checkout and pay £89 instead of £149.94, or for 38% off a bundle without pots, enter the code 67F5FN6J and pay £54.99 rather than £89.97. What’s more, with 20% off all e-gift vouchers, you can treat a friend too – simply enter the code 4BNEDXTH at the checkout to receive your discount!

Get up to 40% off

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Oxy-Plants’ Exotic House Plant set will add a vibrant touch to your home and would make a fabulous gift that grows. A standard bundle without pots includes:

  • 1 x Dragon Tree – native to Madagascar, the Dracaena draco has striking sword-shaped leaves with red edges. It’s an ideal house plant for beginners as it’s easy to care for and thrives in most temperatures. (17cm)
  • 1 x Chinese Evergreen – with eye-catching silver tones, the beautiful leaves on the Aglaonema make it an elegant addition to any room. It’s great for novices as it will grow even when there’s not much light, air or humidity. (17cm)
  • 1 x Umbrella Plant – or Schefflera, originates from Australia and its surrounding islands. With delicate, oval-shaped leaves, this aesthetic plant can grow up to 15 feet tall in the right conditions. (21cm)

Simply enter the code 67F5FN6J at the checkout to claim 38% off this collection.

If you choose the bundle that includes pots, you’ll also receive three 21cm Classic Ceramic Plant Pots in a stylish black – just use the code 7N9TAH5X to get 40% off this set.

Oxy-Plants’ e-gift vouchers are a thoughtful way to treat the gardener in your life. The vouchers can be spent on any item from the online store and will be emailed directly to the recipient within one week of purchasing. To get 20% off an e-gift voucher, simply enter the code 4BNEDXTH at the checkout.

Offer ends 16/08/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.
